title: March 5, 1981: Timex Sinclair ZX81 Launched: Day in Tech History
description: Subscribe! Apple Podcasts | Google Podcasts | Stitcher | RSS | More1981 – The successor to the Sinclair ZX80, Britain’s most popular home computer – the Sinclair ZX81 was launched by Sinclair Research – a Timex Corporation. It was a popular computer mostly because of the price – £69.95 ($99) or £49.95 in kit form. The cheap computer […]
